bonusSoul_single.Wiki: Amount of Souls obtained when the boss is defeated during singleplayer

bonusSoul_multi.Wiki: Amount of Souls obtained when the boss is defeated during multiplayer

humanityPointCountFlagIdTop.Wiki: Leading flag ID for managing humanity drop points

soloBreakInPoint_Min.Wiki: The minimum number of solo entry points added when defeating an area boss

soloBreakInPoint_Max.Wiki: The maximum number of solo entry points added when defeating an area boss

bonusSkillPoint.Wiki: Amount of XP obtianed when the boss is defeated

Self.Wiki: Defines Boss XP and Sen rewards
